text: Mark Burnett (born 17 July 1960) is a television producer based in Los Angeles. He was born in London and raised in Dagenham. He has been married to the actress Roma Downey since 2007. ==Career== Burnett has produced shows including Survivor, The Voice, The Celebrity Apprentice, The Apprentice,TOPIC: MARK BURNETT Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?, and The Contender. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:English television producers Category:People from London
title: Mark Burnett
